author: johnydony
content:
<@!199561711278227457> Hello 
I think this is not the case for asking in this channel, 
But I think you are the only person handle `beaconchain explorer`. So I wanted to ask about beacon chain explorer starting. 

At the moment, I'm in success running beacon chain explorer but has some error like ; 
```ERRO[0002] error exporting sync_committees               duration=1.115847993s error="error exporting snyc-committee at period 0: error retrieving sync_committees for epoch 10 (state: 320): error-response: {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"BAD_REQUEST: state at epoch 10 is not activated for Altair\",\"stacktraces\":[]}"
```

This error have occurred nil pointer deference and drive to kill application. 
I'm using your config.yaml on the branch you PR to. 
If you gave me any advice would be appreciatetd.

Clients are geth-lighthouse pair.

author: johnydony
content:
I think this error cames out because my beacon chain explorer couldn't show epoch 0.
But your explorer show clearly. 
I don't know what is the difference.

author: parithosh
content: Ahhh, the config in the PR is just a template. You have to configure it per network you run it on. Altair should be epoch 50 afaik

author: johnydony
content:
That's why epoch 0 won't come out. 
OK. 
I will follow merge-testnets repo. 
Is that right that follow that repo?

author: johnydony
content: FYI, explorer that I ran follows `kiln` testnet.

author: parithosh
content: Yea but I don't upload the explorer configs there, I can DM it to you later on ðŸ™‚

author: johnydony
content: Thank you so much.

author: johnydony
content: If you guide me to set up, would be so much appreciated.

author: johnydony
content:
I think I have fixed it. 
But another question is that why my explorer couldn't bring epoch 0. 
This is genesis time stamp one ?

author: johnydony
content:
I tried to use one time export. 
Hope that it will be the answer.

author: gwintery
content: This is not the correct place to discuss price speculation on the merge. If you don't have any technical concerns regarding the merge besides saying it's dangerous, please stop posting.

author: brandobot.
content: Is there a page that documents whar work needs to be completed for the merge to happen, alongside any time estimates?

author: gwintery
content: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Merge/mainnet-readiness.md

author: gwintery

author: brandobot.
content: thanks!! Is this list finalized, or do action items get added as time goes on?

author: gwintery
content:
I'm not a core dev, but from what I observe, action items can get added depending on how the tesnets develop.

We are pretty close to finalizing most of it though.
